item.title: Better Off Using Exceptions?

item.description: One of the biggest changes in my JavaScript from learning Rust/Elm/F‚ôØ/etc. is that I now think constantly about what can fail.

item.description: This is interesting: I‚Äôve read some F‚ôØ before, but it reads a lot more obviously to me now that I‚Äôve read a lot of Rust recently. Why? Because for all that they‚Äôre very different languages, both are ML descendants. It shows.
